description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 15th November 2018 (RN 18/08222/FULL) for the External alterations to existing single dwelling to create a sunken roof terrace at main roof level, extend existing basement level, lower the existing basement floor level, erect extension to front elevation at first and second floor level, erect glazed extension in rear second floor lightwell, alterations to rear elevation including replacement of two rear rooflights, installation of one lantern rooflight to the rear and installation of mechanical plant within rear lightwell and creation of lift pit (Linked to 18/08223/LBC). NAMELY, Installing secondary glazing to the front two windows facing York Terrace East and the rear windows serving the kitchen and WC and existing wooden floor with new wooden floor on all floors. Proposed to use carpet for the bedrooms with marble for the bathrooms at this level. Marble will also be used in the hallway and lift lobby areas. A new balustrade is also proposed at this level to that stairs which will match the existing. Suspended ceilings will be also added to this level to accommodate the AC units and services as per the approved drawings. The drawings that have been submitted show the detailed reflected ceiling plans for this level where new lighting will be installed both in the decorative ceilings themselves but also as down lighters or chandeliers. Roof level including a change of material above the lift shaft from lead to aluminium, include new tile vents to serve the risers, installing an alarm for the roof terrace, rear courtyard and front roof terrace and install an enlarged condenser enlarged enclosure in the same position. (Linked to 19/07285/LBC)
